messages.subject: THe pencilboard scan
messages.msgSnippet: Attention Tiffany and anyone else who s interested. I scanned that pencil board with the PeaceMaker Kurogane Harada in all his fundoshi-wearing glory *snicker*
messages.messageBody:
Attention Tiffany and anyone else who's interested. I scanned that
pencil board with the PeaceMaker Kurogane Harada in all his
fundoshi-wearing glory *snicker* It's in the Photos section in the
folder marked "Humor" and you can see the full size closeup version
too. One small problem--I had to cut off Tatsu Ichimura spazzing to get
Saitou in--Who needs to see a dull accountant anyway?

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
